meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>measure</kanji> so the verb vocab means <vocabulary>to measure</vocabulary>. This word generally has to do with scientific or medical measurements.
readingMnemonic: Remember another word that means "to measure?" It is 量る, and has the same reading as this word. That should make things easier to remember.
